data.name: App Co Tycoon
data.detailed_description:
App Co Tycoon

App Co Tycoon is Bussiness Managament Game,
Hire Developers,Designers and Employee
You have to make good conditions for your employees and they should be paid regularly!
You have to give them a nice cafe, break room, and nice study room!
Grow and Build,Upgrade your company by earning money!
Grow your company by hiring Employee and start making money!
Design your company, living room, dining hall, your own room and your employees' room!
Employees make you a decent amount of money, but only if their wages and conditions are good!

data.supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Turkish
